name: FootBall-Mat Two balls
description:
The football is a very challenging game, you must mat 2 ball in the same time.

The two boy mat football in screen,they play football at the same time.When football down to left, you must tap left screen to make left boy mat ball, or tap right.

The more you mat,the more score you will get.

Breath play two balls , is a very interesting thing.

This game requires left and right to work , you want to play good , but not easy Oh , you want a high score challenge , although to try it.
